Name: Picotin
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Bright yellow and on the bitter side of bittersweet with aquavit, lemon, gentian and maraschino liqueurs.
History: Created in 2015 by Florian Dubois at Joyeux Bordel in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Picotin contains 150 calories
